title: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression 'row[0]' is set
description: When attempting to set a filter expression using 'row[0] equals to 0', the result set is incorrect or null.
OB: When setting a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to 0' and clicking on the 'Preview' tab, the first result record is returned.
EB: As the developer mentioned, the 'row[0]' expression can only be used after all the data has been fetched. It should not be used as a filter expression.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set a filter in the data set using the expression 'row[0] equals to 0'.
2. Click on the 'Preview' tab.

Expected result: The result set should not show the first result record based on the invalid filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0'.
